doc: 图片收藏--长按菜单操作

value.text: Tap to take photo and hold to record video

value.content-desc: Double-tap with a one finger to take photo; Double-tap and hold with one finger to take video.

value.text: Tap to take photo and hold to record video

value.content-desc: Double-tap with a one finger to take photo; Double-tap and hold with one finger to take video.
